name: eniac-projeto
description: Projeto para a faculdade ENIAC 2ยบ Semestre

scripts.build: mvn -q clean package && npm run build:clear && npm run build:copy
scripts.dev:mvn: mvn -q compile package && npm run build:clear && npm run build:copy
scripts.dev: concurrently "npx dotenv -e .env -- nodemon --watch src --ext java,html,css,js,jsp --exec 'npm run dev:mvn'"

author: Ryan Prado
